div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Manzanola School District 3J shall strive to provide a safe environment, meaningful opportunities and innovative educational programs for all students so that they reach their learning potential, including that they meet or exceed state and district content standards, through partnerships between home, school, and the community.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque QaN0Zc

div.p: Manzanola is a small rural town located in the southeastern part of Colorado in the Arkansas Valley in Otero County. This area is known for producing much of the fruit and vegetables of the state of Colorado. The elevation of Manzanola is 4255 and the population is between 450 and 500.

Manzanola School District 3J is comprised of Manzanola Elementary School (K-5) and Manzanola Jr-Sr High School (6-12). The current enrollment of each school is about 80 students. Bobcat Pride runs deep throughout this small community.

Manzanola School District offers concurrent credit classes through Otero Junior College in La Junta, where students receive both high school and college credit, in the areas of Math, English, and Speech. Also the district encourages students to take classes at OJC, either in person or online, and will pay tuition for up to 5 classes per semester, which includes concurrent classes.

High School athletic teams offered include 6-man football, girls volleyball, basketball, wrestling and baseball. Arrangements are being made with area schools for interested students to participate in cross-country, golf, softball and track. Junior High athletic teams include football, girls volleyball, baseball, basketball and track.
Clubs and other activities include FFA, Student Council, National Honor Society, Claws for a Cause, Robotics, Art and Drama.

p.strong: Manzanola School District is proud to announce the awarding of a BEST Grant to renovate/build a new K-12 school!

p.em: *Manzanola School District is having problems with our phone systems. If you are needing to reach the elementary school you'll need to call 719-462-5578.

**Manzanola School District is having problems with our phone systems. If you are needing to contact the high school or business manager, you still reach them by calling 719-462-5528 and pressing the appropriate number.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

small.strong: Manzanola School District 3J is an equal opportunity provider.

div.small: Manzanola School District 3J does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.

small.strong: The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:

div.small: For further information on notice of non-discrimination, visit the Office For Civil Rights for the address and phone number of the office that serves your area, or call 1-800-421-3481.
